Class JsonHandler

java.lang.Object
com.rgl.jsonutility.JsonHandler
public class JsonHandler extends Object
Handles reading and writing game data to and from a JSON file. Manages a persistent directory for storing the `gameTable.json` file and provides methods to save and load the list of games.

  • Method Details

    • saveGamesInfo

      public static void saveGamesInfo(List<GameInfo> games)
      Saves the list of games to the JSON file in the persistent directory.
      Parameters:
      games - the list of games to save to the file.

    • loadGamesInfo

      public static List<GameInfo> loadGamesInfo()
      Loads the list of games from the JSON file in the persistent directory. If the file does not exist, it attempts to load data from resources and create the file.
      Returns:
      a list of games loaded from the file or resources.

    • getGameByTitle

      public static GameInfo getGameByTitle(List<GameInfo> games, String title)
      Finds and returns a game by its title.
      Parameters:
      games - the list of games to search through.
      title - the title of the game to find.
      Returns:
      the game with the specified title, or null if not found.

    • updateGameInfo

      public static void updateGameInfo(List<GameInfo> games, GameInfo updatedGame)
      Updates the information of an existing game in the list. If the game with the same title exists, it is updated with the new information.
      Parameters:
      games - the list of games to update.
      updatedGame - the game object with updated information.
